mapper.select: select id histId,user_id userId,exam_paper_id examPaperId,content,create_time createTime,answer_sheet answerSheet,duration from et_user_exam_history where user_id=#{userId} and exam_paper_id=#{examPaperId}
select id histId,user_id userId,exam_paper_id examPaperId,content,create_time createTime,answer_sheet answerSheet,duration from et_user_exam_history where id=#{histId}

select a.user_id userId,b.name paperName,a.exam_paper_id examPaperId,a.create_time createTime,point_get pointGet from et_user_exam_history a, et_exam_paper b where a.exam_paper_id=b.id and a.user_id=#{userId} and submit_time is not null union ALL select user_id userId,name paperName,-1 examPaperId,create_time createTime,0 pointGet from et_practice_paper where user_id=#{userId}
